article.title: Environmental Mission Planner to be Upgraded
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Adaptive Methods Inc., Centreville, Va., is being awarded a $7,477,445 cost-plus-fixed-fee Phase II Small Business Innovation Research contract under topic N02-152, entitled “Environmental Mission Planner.” This effort shall upgrade the existing fleet product, FORCEnet ASPECT, from its current capabilities for the Improved Extended Echo Ranging System and the emerging Multistatic Active Coherent System. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, N.J., is the contracting activity.
